name: BubbLemming (Version with game)
description:
A game I made for Rousr's Virtual Pet Jam... buuut I messed up and didn't actually upload a game. Sooo I lose, but oh well. You can play the game here instead!

Drag-and-Drop to feed the BubbLemming. Click the BubbLemming to pet it and make it happy. Keep it alive. Good luck!
